TopicTitle: Question about upgrading code to work with newer versions of KSP

Articles.Content: I'm trying to update some code from previous versions of KSP, to KSP .23, however it is tossing errors on compile while trying to compile emitter code. The error it tosses is "Cannot convert type 'UnityEngine.ParticleEmitter' to 'UnityEngine.GameObject'. Does anyone know what changed in the code to cause this, and how to fix it?
